column5: Hello  Couple of buddies and I are wanting to go somewhere different so we are tossed up with the two locations...  Does anyone know a good hut operator for either of these locations.  I have always wanted to fish Lake Nipissing but wasnt sure on where and the 3.5 hrs drive was a issue.  but BAY OF QUINTE    what a great fishery  any help would be appreciated  Best regards  Dave

was on Nipissing with  Hyatt Outdoors third week on Jan.Good guy,good operator.Fishing wasn't spectacular but we managed perch,pike,walleye,cisco.He was willing to move us to day huts if we werent happy with the bungalo fishing.All in all I'd go back.
Well if this is just a day trip I'd think Quinte would be your best bet.
http://www.fishfindercharters.com/ \ Give dave a call. He has a first class buisness going.
